website_summaries.verdict: Author's expertise with social work testing system comes through in a very helpful test prep book.
pros: Popular prep source that's well-trusted among those in the field
Plenty of content that delivers the important information
Solid advice on preparing for the ASWB exam
cons: Some problems with the book's print quality

customer_reviews.title: I passed!!
customer_reviews.text: This book was suggested by a friend that went to the refresher course for LICSW testing. I had failed the first time and she said “buy this book”. It was instrumental in me passing. It helped condense information and got me thinking differently about the testing. I highly recommend this book if you are studying for your clinical exam. Good luck!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P.

customer_reviews.title: Good study guide for the license exam
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my wife near the end of her two years of clinical supervision. She was able to study out of the book or, even on her phone. That's a great feature. Whenever you have a moment, you can study no matter where you are. Then, on test day, she passed like I knew she would and, it was a decisive victory.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Just passed, first try. i Used this book ...
customer_reviews.text: Just passed, first try. i Used this book, the NAMI websites psychotropic list, and a glance at the DSM. Nothing adequately prepares you for FIRST/BEST questions where none of the answers are quite right
customer_reviews.author: Kristen S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this book
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this book. It definitely helped me pass the exam. I would highly recommend! Several things I liked about it 1: the overview of every topic that the test could cover helped me identify where I needed to focus. Things I already felt confident in, I could skip, and things I didn't know, I could review in more depth 2: the test was also super helpful in helping me understand why I missed what I missed and what I needed to go back and review. You will never feel completely ready for this LCSW exam, but this helped me go in w/ enough confidence that I didn't really have test day jitters and was able to pass!
customer_reviews.author: okayhoma

customer_reviews.title: So helpful.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great guide for reviewing information you need to know for the exam, however, I would say that the thing I am most thankful for during my time studying was purchasing the official practice exam. The practice exam helped me prepare for the way the exam asks questions. This book helped me remember all the things I studied during my studies for my bachelor and master degrees.
customer_reviews.author: R. K. Marquez

customer_reviews.title: This book’s errors can cause social worker to fail the exam!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this zero stars, I would. There are fatal errors in this book. See the pictures. The book states PDs should be diagnosed in people 21 and over. The DSM 5 states 18 and over. Many people fail this test by just one point. I have found several other fatal errors but just citing one here for the sake of time. DO NOT BUY THIS BOOK! IT MAT CAUSE YOU TO FAIL THE EXAM!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Mayer

customer_reviews.title: This book seems great
customer_reviews.text: So far the book has what I need. Just a synopsis of the information I learned in grad school to help me with my exam. But the 3 stars is because like many others the access code to the app doesn't work. Its really frustrating because it looks VERY intentional to make the code illegible. I scratched it off with great care knowing the reviews but there is nothing there! I will connect the information I get from this book to an app I paid for to help me study. So long story short. Buy the book for the content but the app is a hoax.
customer_reviews.author: BrooklynDodger

customer_reviews.title: 3rd time was the charm.
customer_reviews.text: I took the LCSW exam twice before yesterday. Both times I failed. I used 1 study system and attended a boot camp involving another study system. I ordered this in March, as recommended by a few people, and I finally passed the exam yesterday. This is hands down THE best overall study guide for the exam, in my opinion. The exam is still hard, don’t get me wrong. But this book makes things more understandable and less intimidating, in my opinion. I recommend it with 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: ph2072

customer_reviews.title: Boooo
customer_reviews.text: The book itself is SUCH poor quality. Words are cut off of the bottom of the book. It looks like it's supposed to have an online component, but it doesn't actually scratch off. The book itself is written well, I guess. But there are not a lot of questions in the back of the book on which to quiz yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Madeleine Blum

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t receive what I was supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Edit—got a replacement. SECOND ALSO came with no code. The place where it would be is blank. This is a scam—they’re not real copies they’re knock offs. I’m returning it and asking for another resplacement. We’ll see what happens the THIRD time. So far it’s fraud. Bought new book. Received dirty and beat up book with no app code. Super frustrating as planned to start studying and now have to wait three more days for a replacement. Also, it wasn’t just missing the code it simply never had one, just a blank space. Are these even legit or are they knock offs?
customer_reviews.author: oldtintype

customer_reviews.title: Comprehensive text and Kindle tricks :)
customer_reviews.text: This book definitely was a comprehensive overview. It was well organized and prepped me on test material. I actually downloaded the kindle version which worked well for me because I could highlight sections and kindle helped generate flashcards, which was super handy. I could also search foggy terms straight from kindle and add in my own notes. 5 stars for the text... and thanks kindle for being my study buddy :)
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Mueller

customer_reviews.title: BEST!! -- Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the ONLY book you will need to study in order to pass your exam (aside from the DSM, and maybe one about psychiatric medication). No use wasting money on other material. This covers everything in a very straight forward manner and gives tips for test taking that are VERY helpful. There is also an on-line version that comes with it that I would use A LOT. I'd have my phone read it to me using text to talk while I was driving and doing other tasks, that way I wasn't having to sit and read 100% of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey Conley

customer_reviews.title: Pass the clinical test in less than a day
customer_reviews.text: This thing made me pass in less than 24hrs. I got my letter of approval to take the test and due to COVID the only available appointment for months was one for the next day of scheduling. I read this book and studied the whole day before and a couple hours before the exam and passed! Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ecuadorean guy

customer_reviews.title: THE APP IS A SCAM
customer_reviews.text: I bought this book for the app to study on the go, my book came with an activation code that did NOTHING. The app prompted me to get premium use if I wanted to access more than a "free quiz" so I bought it. It only unlocked a few quiz questions and prompted me to buy the whole program for $79.99. Screw that. I'll just buy from Therapist Development Center with my next paycheck. Stupid low budget book.
customer_reviews.author: MsLuna

customer_reviews.title: One good source, but buy the ASWB practice test and guide also!
customer_reviews.text: It was in good condition and easy reading. I would advise anyone taking the LISW/LCSW test to buy the ASWB practice test questions and guide in addition to this book, or one like it!..you want to practice questions put out by who actually writes the test.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: I passed
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying I passed my licensing exam. I found this book helpful overall. There were some questions that seemed out of date versus the actual exam. In my experience there were a lot of questions about ethics and decision making and hardly any about diagnosis, medications, treatment modalities, etc. I think the book is helpful, but by no means should you memorize the content within as being representative to the real exam. Know the overall content and study ethics more than you think.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Cheney

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment to pass the aswb clinical exam
customer_reviews.text: I don’t really write product reviews but for social workers who are preparing for the aswb clinical exam - buy this book! There were minor spelling errors but the content will help you pass the aswb clinical exam. I also downloaded the pocket book prep application on my iPhone as a studying tool and a studying guide from a prep course. The only thing I found lacking in this study guide is the lack of research covered but otherwise, i feel like it helped me pass the exam.
customer_reviews.author: My-Linh

customer_reviews.title: I guess I shouldn't be surpised
customer_reviews.text: I haven't started using the book to study yet so I can't speak to the quality of the material but I too, have been unable to activate the code to unlock the App. Very frustrating when something is advertised as coming with something 'extra' only for it not to work. At this rate, I should have purchased a used copy and saved $20.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helped me pass!
customer_reviews.text: I used this book for the ASWB Exam and passed! It was easy to follow and understand. I went through it 2-3x before my exam and used the Pocketprep app with it. Seemed to be effective. However there were a few sections that did not fully cover a subject. Also, I wish there were more than one practice test included with questions closer to those on the test. The questions on the test were more "BEST" or "NEXT" format while the ones in this book are basic.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: I feel like I knew what to expect and I passed
customer_reviews.text: This book was so helpful to my studying for the LCSW exam. Similar to the other reviews I used this book and the dsm for most of my studying. The tips in the front of the book were very helpful in terms of preparing to study and take the exam. I feel like I knew what to expect and I passed!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Schraml

customer_reviews.title: Detail oriented
customer_reviews.text: I found this book to be extremely beneficial to my study routine. I was able to pass my LCSW exam with this book in coordination with the therapist development center program. This book is definitely very detailed oriented. I gave it four stars because I don’t feel the book gave enough information on how to answer the questions on the actual exam. It definitely gave a good outline on topics that may be on the exam, I just wished it would’ve provided hints and tips on how to answer actual exam questions.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Vestal

customer_reviews.title: Great book!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. I used this book, Code of Ethics and the DSM quick reference sheet. I got side tracked after my MSW (graduated four years ago) and passed the test on the first try! Super grateful for this book and a wonderful review of the material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Tips
customer_reviews.text: This book when used in conjunction with pocket prep app is helpful. I do feel like I still could not have passed on just the book alone however. Therapist Development Program was also essential. A combination of the two helped me prepare.
customer_reviews.author: Haylee S.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Passed my exam no thanks to this. Not even close to exam. Practice exam has only 4 questions different from old book. Save money and forget the new one and don’t depend on this alone for prep. Would be better to pay code ASWB Practice exam
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Thayne

customer_reviews.title: No code and so I can't use the app
customer_reviews.text: I, too, carefully scratched off the gray covering to reveal the code and the paper came with it. I saw a blurry code underneath it. It was too obliterated to use. I contacted customer support and got no answer. I loaded the app onto my phone and couldn't figure out where to put the code in to unlock anything.
customer_reviews.author: James Fieser

customer_reviews.title: Great study guide
customer_reviews.text: The book did a great job at giving a comprehensive guide to prepare for the LCSW test. The test questions were very useful and formatted similar to the test. This definatly helped me pass the test
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The book I have is brand new and came in a good time. Beginning of the book is very helpful ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm currently using it right now to study for the Clinical. The book I have is brand new and came in a good time. Beginning of the book is very helpful to try and decrease your anxiety for the test. I have downloaded the free app. It does cost extra more if you want additional questions to practice with. Some of the questions at the end look familiar to the old version.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Webster

customer_reviews.title: Passed
customer_reviews.text: There is a lot of content in this book, but if you focus on the items that you need the most help with, it's very helpful. This can even be used for practice after you pass your exam. I used this and pocket prep and passed my exam.
customer_reviews.author: Myles Cameron

customer_reviews.title: I used this book and passed on my first try!
customer_reviews.text: The book was a dry read, but I expected that considering it is for test prep. I focused on the practice test- especially the reasoning given behind the answers and I passed my test on the first try.
customer_reviews.author: Melina Stone

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend this one!
customer_reviews.text: This book was perfect! I took my LMSW yesterday and PASSED! I was 2 years post graduate and this book provided information I needed. I also utilized additional resources for more in depth review of certain areas but this book was a wonderful guide of need to know info.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Every social worker needs this.
customer_reviews.text: Just finished reading it and am still using it to study for my LCSW exam. All the info in direct and to the point; focusing on exactly what you need to know for the exam. Great study tool!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: I WANT TO RETURN THIS BECAUSE I STILL CANNOT ACCESS THE CONTENT BECAUSE I DID NOT BUY THE BOOK. ADVERTISEMENT DID NOT STATE I NEEDED TO BUY THE BOOK--WHICH IS WAY TOO EXPENSIVE.
customer_reviews.author: Liliana Mejia

customer_reviews.title: I passed!
customer_reviews.text: This book was well organized and easy to follow, and left me feeling ready for the test. The only area I would supplement with another study guide is the DSM 5 criteria as they are not detailed in the book. I passed on my first attempt after studying with this book and have recommended it to several colleagues already.
customer_reviews.author: xevaughn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used Apgar's book/app and DSM5 to prepare for exam. Passed it today!
customer_reviews.author: Mamako

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service by Springer and Higher Learning Technology
customer_reviews.text: The code on the book was not visible. When I reached out to get help it took them days to get back to me. Then they wanted me to send them all types of pics of the book. When I sent them the pics they said that I would have to get in touch with Springer and send them more photographs. It’s frustrating and aggravating. I would not advise anytime buy this book.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I passed!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this book, LCSW bootcamp (google it), Phillip Luttrell, and Resolution today, both on YouTube. I passes yesterday. There is a specific way you have to answer the questions. It was 95 percent scenario questions. Once you know how to answer those, you will pass.
customer_reviews.author: Jahaira S.

customer_reviews.title: Most Helpful
customer_reviews.text: I tried to use a variety of materials to prepare for the test, but this book was the most helpful. I primarily used it and I passed.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Garcia

customer_reviews.title: GREAT INVESTMENT INTO MY FUTURE
customer_reviews.text: I have used other material to study and failed. This prep book is comprehensive and it is the BOMB!! If it was not for the Apgar book and app don't know what I would have done
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Michele Peoples

customer_reviews.title: Comprehensive book, invalid activation code
customer_reviews.text: Book is comprehensive, a lot of the material is repeated Bount book new and activation code was INVALID which is a shame to spend so much on a book for the premium study material yet code does not work
customer_reviews.author: jazmin

customer_reviews.title: Activation Code does not work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this book for the app and the activation code does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I needed to study for the LCSW exam. The app was really easy to navigate and customer support was super fast when I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: Bat Ma

customer_reviews.title: I need a code!
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I was wondering how to get another replacement code for the app. I was really looking forward to being able to study on the go with the app. I bought a new copy, and followed instructions to scratch off the silver and it went through, or there wasn't a code?
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great to review
customer_reviews.text: It has been a few years since I finished my MSW program and I was nervous about taking my LICSW exam. Thankfully this book gave a great overview of the material and the exam was good too. I ended up getting the exact same score on the practice exam as I did on my actual exam. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: M Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this study guide new because I did not want other people’s notes or hightlighted passages. Instead I got multiple pages glued together and glue on pages. My biggest issue was the access to the app. It actually is a free trial then you have to pay a pretty hearty fee to access the majority of the information. What I received was not worth the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Knock-Off-Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: This is a knock off. There is NO code to access a mobile app! Don't bother trying to rub off the gray shaded box. Also, page 197 doesn't follow page 196. As you can see, page 204 is on the following page and upside-down! Good news, is that I can find page 197. It's upside-down right before page 205 😵 I feel ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it’s supposed to. Must have for lcsw exam takers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: The book came nicely wrapped and it came with everything the description said. The additional app and practice test in the back.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina E.

customer_reviews.title: No scratch off.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two books and still have no access to the app. The first one I bought was used, so I thought maybe that was why (see blank scratch off picture). Then I bought a brand new one (see first scratch off picture) and that’s what I received. So frustrated because I was relying on the app to study on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Code Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this book because the lower level (LCS) exam prep book was great. I paid the extra money to get the code to get access to the full online access and the code does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Romaro

customer_reviews.title: Passed exam first try ! Only used this book to study!
customer_reviews.text: Pass the exam first try . So .... there’s that . Good price . This is the only book I used to study .
customer_reviews.author: Spring rain

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: Book was used despite being advertised as new. Therefore the code for the app didn’t work. The content itself was good but I was excited about using the app as well.
customer_reviews.author: Randilee Groff

customer_reviews.title: I PASSED!!!
customer_reviews.text: This book really did assist in me passing the ASWB clinical exam. It’s comprehensive and the practice test was very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Starrfish

customer_reviews.title: invalid activation code
customer_reviews.text: Comprehensive guide. Comes with activation code for app/online use but I was unable to access. Multiple attempts but was always instructed code was “invalid” - no assistance given after contact made.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Digital Access Code
customer_reviews.text: Digital access code isn’t valid. I contacted Springer Pub and was advised this seller is not legit.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Gilson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy used if you want access to online study guide
customer_reviews.text: This was a great study guide, easy to read, and informative. I bought a used one so could not access the online test or study guide. If you want access to the online stuff don’t buy used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: I order this book 2 months ago and went to start studying and the code for the app was not there. Totally scam.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No code! What a rip off! Deserves zero stars.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed to find that there was no code after scratching gently. I thought there was something off when the packaging arrived torn but gave it a chance. Extreme let down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great study resource!
customer_reviews.text: Great resource! The practice exam was really helpful in getting used to the style of questioning and the book itself gave a very thorough review of material. I passed the exam!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well Organized and Thorough
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to get a jump on studying for the CSW test. The book has really good test taking hints and things to know about this test before taking it. So far it has been easy to read and covers a lot of material.
customer_reviews.author: cnorthup

customer_reviews.title: The app is not free
customer_reviews.text: I brought the book for the free app. You only get the basic with the free app, 4 sample questions To get the benefit of the app, you have to purchase the upgraded, which is $79 or $99.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scam! Code/App not given!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The code was not there as advertised! It was very disappointing, since that is the main reason I purchased this study guide.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pass that test!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this book to study for the LCSW exam. I think the material will help with the exam! I especially like the mock test in the back of the book.
customer_reviews.author: Very Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Well-organized
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful - gave me confidence going in to the exam. Passed on my first try.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Elston

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in good time. Good condition.
customer_reviews.text: Written for eighth grade reading level. Not detailed or comprehensive. In order to use the online test bank, you have to download stuff you probably don't want. Crap!
customer_reviews.author: Bert G.

customer_reviews.title: Code for Free App was not inside cover of studyguide.
customer_reviews.text: There was no activation code included for the app that is included with study guide. I did not return it because I needed it to study for exam.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The information is great.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this study guide I have gained insight on how to prepare for my LCSW. The guide is easy to follow and provides detail information.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Rosario-Luaces

customer_reviews.title: Scratching the protective coating off doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I tried to scratch off the protective coating to reveal the passcode but it didn’t work. I can’t have digital access to the book! What a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Eman59

customer_reviews.title: Need code to access computer version
customer_reviews.text: The code in front of book to download computer version does not work. Is there any way I can get a workable code? Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Weblink Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: The link for the online version stopped working before I could finish studying. Seems like a waste, and I wish I would have gotten a book.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Riley

customer_reviews.title: Great resource!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Exactly what I needed for a study material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not helpful!
customer_reviews.text: This book was not helpful, and did not even come close to preparing me for the exam. Very little of what I studied in the book was on the actual test. I was extremely disappointed. The practice test itself was irrelevant. Just a heads up for those looking for a quality study guide for the clinical exam.
customer_reviews.author: L.I

customer_reviews.title: Good study guide
customer_reviews.text: Helped me prepare and pass on the first try! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella Marks

customer_reviews.title: Problem
customer_reviews.text: I scratched off the box for the code for online access there is no code. Can you please send me a code
customer_reviews.author: marie

customer_reviews.title: Digital Acess code did not work
customer_reviews.text: I was not able to access the code and I purchased my book new
customer_reviews.author: Shatoyia Stovall

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for anyone studying for the Clinical Social Work exam!
customer_reviews.text: This was very helpful in preparing for my CSW exam. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Aurora Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Missing code
customer_reviews.text: Had the code for the app already scratched off an used
customer_reviews.author: Samantha M

customer_reviews.title: I think Apgar does a good job of breaking down the material in a comprehensive ...
customer_reviews.text: I passed my exam today using only this book and Apgar's practice test book (which I found difficult and lowered my self-esteem). I think Apgar does a good job of breaking down the material in a comprehensive way. The book is a little repetitive and I could be organized in a more comprehensive way but ultimately extremely helpful. Apgar gets inside the brain of the exam, which is what's needed to pass! THANK YOU :)!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Gerstein

customer_reviews.title: I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: This books has been very helpful is guiding my preparation for the LCSW exam. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna S. Reed

customer_reviews.title: I find Social Work ASWB Clinical Exam Guide
customer_reviews.text: I am preparing for my LCSW although I haven't sit for my test yet I believe this is a helpful tool.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Friend read this and passed exam 1st try
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact it explains everything in detail. Been reading every page from beginning. I’ve only read 1/4 of book so far. I purchased way in advance to read the entire book and take my time absorbing all the information.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super helpful
customer_reviews.text: Super helpful book. It broke down what I needed to study and gave me study tips on how to answer the questions. Passed my test the first time just using this.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Detailed
customer_reviews.text: The book is helpful in providing the additional study that I need.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

product_meta.title: Social Work ASWB Clinical Exam Guide, Second Edition: A Comprehensive Study Guide for Success - Book and Free App – Updated ASWB Clinical Exam Guide with ASWB Clinical Practice Exam
